Title: Backkom Meogeujan Yeohaeng
Description: ['A cowardly boy ends up having a magic necklace delivered to him which transports him to the world of Backkom. There the rag-tag team get out of jams and the boy learns a bit of courage by the time he arrives home.']
Related: ['Parent story: Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari', 'Other: Chen-Kuro Gakuen', 'Sequel: Chein Kuro-Nikuru!! Kanketsu-hen']
